info.name: XSS-Protection Header - Cross-Site Scripting
author: joshlarsen
info.description: XSS-Protection header in Explorer, Chrome, and Safari contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability if set to any value other than `0`.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: idee.emploi.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response: HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Accept-Ranges: bytes Content-Security-Policy: upgrade-insecure-requests Content-Type: text/html Date: Sun, 25 Sep 2022 04:33:23 GMT Last-Modified: Thu, 17 Mar 2016 18:36:16 GMT Referrer-Policy: strict-origin Set-Cookie: BIGipServerpool-dgefp-simuap.cegedim.cloud-HTTP=!KXd3Pfdb4bymbUBnRzbxqujnleDLVnJBNIGLoyC5xgJtG9+ShqhzZxIacnhN9tIB5BS6lixF85pR/6rkqlzoHGX206U=; path=/; Httponly; Secure Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains Vary: Accept-Encoding X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: sameorigin X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block Simulateur Activité partielle | Portail des politiques publiques de l’emploi et de la formation professionnelle
